resources.string:
Welcome to the balloon game! 

In this game you are asked to pump up 30 balloons. 

To pump up a balloon tap the “PUMP“ button. Try it!

For each pump you get points. 

But remember balloons pop if you pump them up too much! 

If a balloon pops, you will not collect points. You have to wait for the next balloon and try again.

Some of these balloons might pop after one pump, others might not pop until they fill the entire screen. \n\nIt is up to you to decide how much to pump each balloon. How many pumps does it take to pop this balloon? Try it!
You can stop pumping at any time by tapping the “COLLECT POINTS” button. Try it!
The more points you collect the higher the prize will be. \n\nThere are four prizes: a small prize, a medium prize, a big prize, and a bonus prize. The meter will show you how close you are to each.
Start the Balloon Game when you are ready.
" You pump up on the balloon by touching on the "Pump" button with your finger. TRY IT!!! "
